block_comment: This block manages a wait state counter within a clocked system. The 'if' condition checks the status of 'wait_state_cnt_en_r', if not true, it resets the count and status of 'wait_state_cnt_r' and 'cnt_wait_state'. If 'true', the condition further checks whether the 'wait_state_cnt_r' is less than 15, if so, it increments the 'wait_state_cnt_r', otherwise, resets it and sets 'cnt_wait_state' to true, marking the end of counting. This implements a 16-state cyclic counter with overflow indication.
